short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shows the numeric average grade in the popup dialog each time it appears.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances StudentWeb by automatically calculating and displaying the average grade in the course histograms. When viewing grade distributions, it seamlessly adds the numerical average (where A=5, B=4, etc.) next to the existing statistics.
